theme-id: bongoCat
theme-name: "Bongo Cat"

theme-author: "System"
theme-version: "1.0"

# === COLOR PALETTE ===
color-primary: "#ffb6c1"

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# COMPONENT: DRAGGABLE PROGRESS BAR
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# PASTE YOUR BONGO CAT BASE64 GIF HERE:
bar-sprite: "data:image/gif;base64,"
bar-sprite-width: 40
bar-sprite-height: 30
# Keep the same starry background or use a different one
bar-track-bg: "data:image/gif;base64,"
# Pink/coral gradient for a cozy feel
bar-fill-gradient: "linear-gradient(to bottom, #ffb6c1 0%, #ff69b4 50%, #ff1493 100%)"
bar-border-radius: "8px"
bar-height: "16px"

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# COMPONENT: BUTTONS
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

button-active-bg: "linear-gradient(135deg, #ff1493 0%, #ff69b4 100%)"
button-text-color: "#ffffff"
button-border-radius: "10px"
button-padding: "10px 18px"

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# COMPONENT: TOGGLE
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# PASTE YOUR BONGO CAT TOGGLE SPRITE HERE (or reuse bar-sprite):
toggle-sprite: "data:image/gif;base64,"
toggle-sprite-width: 50
toggle-sprite-height: 40
toggle-idle-bg: "#2d2d2d"
toggle-hover-bg: "#3d3d3d"

# Bongo Cat Theme

The adorable musical cat that plays along with any song - cozy, playful, and wholesome vibes.

## Setup Required

**IMPORTANT:** You need to paste your Bongo Cat base64 GIF string in the frontmatter above!

Look for these fields and replace `PASTE_YOUR_BONGO_CAT_BASE64_HERE`:
- `bar-sprite` - The progress bar sprite
- `toggle-sprite` - The toggle button sprite

## Preview

This theme features:
- Bongo Cat sprite on progress bars
- Soft pink/coral color palette
- Cozy dark theme
- Rounded, friendly UI elements

## How to Get the Base64 String

1. Find or create your Bongo Cat GIF
2. Go to https://base64.guru/converter/encode/image/gif
3. Upload the GIF
4. Copy the base64 string
5. Paste it after `data:image/gif;base64,` in the fields above

## Credits

- Bongo Cat by @StrayRogue and @DitzyFlama
- Original meme from 2018
